resources.string: No view for menu provided. You must either call .withMenuView(View) or pass a valid resource id to .withMenuLayout(int)
Your content view must contain exactly one child. Make sure you call inject() after setContentView().
Scan a Barcode or QR Code
Access to SD Card is not granted, the application cannot save QR Code

Intelligent Contacts Solution LTD (ICS) was founded 2007 and is regulated by the communication Authority of Kenya as a content service provider. Our focus as an IT company is on It infrastructure and Software Development. MARIKITI is is a product of the e-commerce division of the company and was developed as a solution to support Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises(MSMEs), and Small and Medium Enterprises(SMEs) in Kenya. We truly believe that the future of business is in e-commerce

Our mission is to support MSMEs and SMEs into sustainable businesses using technology. Most businesses have relied on the traditional brick and mortar set up and the ‘need’ to stay local to keep them going. It is important for business men to learn about e-commerce (especially mobile e-commerce) because creating and supporting new businesses will soon rely heavily on online businesses. This is why we’ve created a platform that unites the business world and the community through software; to help these businesses grow every single day.
We strive to be the largest e-commerce provider in Kenya, giving every single business a chance to grow and be sustainable irrespective of their location, size, ownership or financial background.
